meanings.definition: The quality or state of being loyal.
meanings.sent1: Her lealty to her best friend never wavered.
meanings.sent2: The dog showed lealty to its owner by always staying by their side.
meanings.sent3: The lealty of the cat to the fish was tested when the bowl was left unattended.
meanings.sent4: His lealty to the company was as strong as a fortress.
meanings.sent5: The soldier's lealty to his country was unwavering and true.

meanings.definition: The act of being faithful or devoted to a person, cause, or duty.
meanings.sent1: She demonstrated lealty by always keeping her promises.
meanings.sent2: The lealty of the knight to his king was unquestionable.
meanings.sent3: The lealty of the squirrel to its favorite tree was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her lealty to her favorite sports team was like a badge of honor.
meanings.sent5: The lealty of the old watch to keeping time was remarkable.
